paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation covers the project folders and items you will find under the ../index.xml Project Items folder and the ../../eiffel_libraries/index.xml Eiffel Libraries folder.

explicit_clusters.xml Explicit Cluster Folders
The ../../../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xml clusters folders that have been explicitly added to projects using the ../../../configuring/adding_items/new_cluster_wizard.xml Add New Cluster Wizard

cluster_context_menu.xml Explicit Cluster Folders Context Menu
The available context menu options on an explicit cluster folder in an EiffelEnvision ../../project.xml Projects .

cluster_folders.xml Cluster Folders
The folders that have been implicitly added to projects, under explicit cluster folders, using the because of an explicit cluster folder's recursive state. See the section on automatic cluster enumeration (below).

cluster_folder_context_menu.xml Cluster Folders Context Menu
The available context menu options on cluster folders in an EiffelEnvision ../../project.xml Projects .

cluster_enumeration.xml Automatic Cluster Enumeration
Details the implicit adding of items/eiffel_classes.xml Eiffel Class File Items through the automatic enumeration of an explicit cluster folder's contents, mirroring the ../../../../../../../technologies/dotnet/index.xml Eiffel for .NET compiler's behavior.

items/index.xml Other File Items
Documentation on all of the types of files items found in EiffelEnvision ../../project.xml Projects .
